Physical conditions (A) Evidence: Course change in lower section, slight increase in accessability.
Physical conditions (B) Particulars: The upper log jam has built up, and appeared to be impassable at the end of the spawning period. Fresh blowdown near mouth.
Physical conditions (C) Water levels: Consistently good water levels through the spawning period. Slight flooding during the last two weeks of October.
Biological conditions (D) Particulars: Up to log jam at 1 km.
Biological conditions (E) Predators comm: Moderate impact from birds and bears.
Biological conditions (G) New obstructio: The upper log jam must be monitored in future years to monitor changes. Some work should be done on it before next season. The blowdown at the mouth is not a problem at this time.
Comments: Incredibly poor return of chum salmon - consistent with the rest of the sub-area.
